title: That’s a Great Question! (Ep. 192 Rebroadcast)
description: Verbal tic or strategic rejoinder? Whatever the case: it’s rare to come across an interview these days where at least one question isn’t a “great” one.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
